comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Bostonian, held the record for swimming the New York Tribune's Marathon Swim from the Battery to Sandy Hook (in 7 hours, 18 minutes) in 1914; was a swimming coach at City College of New York. He died in action during WWI, in 1918. He's part of the Boston College veterans' memorial: veteransmemorial.bc.edu/record/ww1-1916-meehan-george
